name: Level Grind
description: A big storage of levels for grinding!

hard-separate.name: Separate Hard Difficulty
hard-separate.description: By turning this on you unlock separating hard difficulty. You can choose either 4 or 5 stars.

hard-choice.name: Hard Difficulty
hard-choice.description: Amount of stars for hard difficulty

harder-separate.name: Separate Harder Difficulty
harder-separate.description: By turning this on you unlock separating harder difficulty. You can choose either 6 or 7 stars.

harder-choice.name: Harder Difficulty
harder-choice.description: Amount of stars for harder difficulty

insane-separate.name: Separate Insane Difficulty
insane-separate.description: By turning this on you unlock separating insane difficulty. You can choose either 8 or 9 stars.

insane-choice.name: Insane Difficulty
insane-choice.description: Amount of stars for insane difficulty

newer-first.name: Newer First
newer-first.description: Sorts levels by upload date, newer first.

req-helper-check.name: Request Staff Access
req-helper-check.description: Gives you Helper / Admin perms if you're a staff member.

disable-star-particles.name: Disable Star Particles
disable-star-particles.description: Disables star particles at the background of grinding levels layer.

rgbBackground.name: Background Color
rgbBackground.description: Customize the background color of the **Main Page**, **Browser Layer** and **Level Info Layer**!

background-speed.name: Background Speed
background-speed.description: Changes the speed of the background in the Main Page, Browser Layer and Level Info Layer. Default is 0.5, lower is slower, higher is faster.

disable-custom-background.name: Disable Custom Background
disable-custom-background.description: Disables the custom background color and sets it to default.

no-badge-for-mods.name: No Badges for GD Mods
no-badge-for-mods.description: Hides the badge for GD Staff Team.

disable-badges.name: Disable Badges
disable-badges.description: Hides all badges added by the mod.
